title: The Beginning of Everything
description: A mysterious event sets everything in motion as our heroes meet for the first time.

title: Shadows in the Dark
description: The team investigates strange occurrences in an abandoned warehouse district.

title: Breaking Point
description: Tensions rise as the group faces their first major challenge together.

title: The Lost Archives
description: An ancient library holds secrets that could change everything they know.

title: Fractured Trust
description: A betrayal from within threatens to tear the team apart.

title: Echoes of the Past
description: Season premiere reveals connections to events from decades ago.

title: The Witness
description: A key witness emerges with information that changes the investigation.

title: Crossroads
description: Each character must make a difficult choice that will define their future.

title: The Gathering Storm
description: All forces converge as the conflict reaches a boiling point.

title: Revelations
description: The truth behind the conspiracy is finally revealed in shocking detail.

title: New Dawn
description: In the aftermath, the team must rebuild and prepare for what comes next.

title: Parallel Lines
description: Two separate storylines begin that seem unrelated but destined to intersect.

title: The Infiltrator
description: Someone new joins the team with hidden motives and a dangerous past.

title: Ghost Protocol
description: A classified operation from the past resurfaces with deadly consequences.

title: The Price of Victory
description: Success comes at a cost as personal sacrifices mount.

title: Convergence
description: All storylines collide in an explosive mid-season finale.

title: Aftermath
description: The team deals with the fallout and unexpected consequences of recent events.

title: The Final Piece
description: A crucial discovery provides the last piece of a complex puzzle.

title: Point of No Return
description: The team faces their greatest challenge yet with no turning back.

title: Legacy
description: The season finale brings closure to some stories while opening new chapters.

description: The truth behind the conspiracy is finally revealed in shocking detail.
